languages.text: "Вот, значит, какова служба Инквизиции? Проклятые места, невообразимые ужасы, высокие ставки..."
languages.translation_comment: During Heinrix's first quest (to deal with a corrupted cogitator on Kiava Gamma).

traits.locale_text: "Вот, значит, какова служба Инквизиции? Проклятые места, невообразимые ужасы, высокие ставки..."

languages.text: "Is this what serving in the Inquisition is like? Cursed places, inconceivable horrors, high stakes..."
languages.translation_comment: During Heinrix's first quest (to deal with a corrupted cogitator on Kiava Gamma).
languages.original_text: "Вот, значит, какова служба Инквизиции? Проклятые места, невообразимые ужасы, высокие ставки..."

traits.locale_text: "Is this what the Inquisition's service is like? Cursed places, inconceivable horrors, high stakes..."
"Is this what the Inquisition's service is like? Cursed places, inconceivable horrors, high stakes..."
"Is this what serving in the Inquisition is like? Cursed places, inconceivable horrors, high stakes..."
"Is this what serving in the Inquisition is like? Cursed places, inconceivable horrors, high stakes..."
"Is this what serving in the Inquisition is like? Cursed places, inconceivable horrors, high stakes..."
"Is this what serving in the Inquisition is like? Cursed places, inconceivable horrors, high stakes..."

languages.text: 「異端審問庁に仕えるというのは、こんな感じなのですか？呪われた場所に、想像もつかない恐怖、そして一瞬の判断が命取りになる状況…」
languages.original_text: "Is this what serving in the Inquisition is like? Cursed places, inconceivable horrors, high stakes..."

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問庁に仕えるというのは、こんな感じなのですか？呪われた場所に、想像もつかない恐怖、そして一瞬の判断が命取りになる状況…」

languages.text: "So ist das doch einfach, wenn man in der Inquisition dient, oder nicht? Verfluchte Orte, unvorstellbare Schrecken, gewaltiges Risiko ..."
languages.original_text: "Is this what serving in the Inquisition is like? Cursed places, inconceivable horrors, high stakes..."

traits.locale_text: "So ist das doch einfach, wenn man in der Inquisition dient, oder nicht? Verfluchte Orte, unvorstellbare Schrecken, gewaltiges Risiko ..."

languages.text: « Est-ce la norme pour les inquisiteurs ? Des lieux maudits, des horreurs inconcevables, des enjeux majeurs... »
languages.original_text: "Is this what serving in the Inquisition is like? Cursed places, inconceivable horrors, high stakes..."

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce la norme pour les inquisiteurs ? Des lieux maudits, des horreurs inconcevables, des enjeux majeurs... »

languages.text: «¿Esto es lo que entraña servir a la Inquisición? Lugares malditos, horrores inconcebibles, alto riesgo...».
languages.original_text: "Is this what serving in the Inquisition is like? Cursed places, inconceivable horrors, high stakes..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Esto es lo que entraña servir a la Inquisición? Lugares malditos, horrores inconcebibles, alto riesgo...».

languages.text: “这就是在审判庭工作的感觉吗？充满诅咒的地方、难以想象的恐怖之物、无处不在的危险……”
languages.original_text: "Is this what serving in the Inquisition is like? Cursed places, inconceivable horrors, high stakes..."

traits.locale_text: “这就是在审判庭工作的感觉吗？充满诅咒的地方、难以想象的恐怖之物、无处不在的危险……”

languages.text: "Engizisyon'a hizmet etmek böyle bir şey mi yani? Lanetli yerler, akılalmaz korkular, inanılmaz riskler..."
languages.original_text: "Is this what serving in the Inquisition is like? Cursed places, inconceivable horrors, high stakes..."

traits.locale_text: "Engizisyon'a hizmet etmek böyle bir şey mi yani? Lanetli yerler, akılalmaz korkular, inanılmaz riskler..."
